MajorClaims.Text: learning about life through personal experience seems more appropriate

Claims.Text: the way of learning life through listening to the advice of family and friends is more realistic than the latter
finding out life through personal experience can help you become more independent and mature
experiencing the real life by myself, I could learn more than just obey the advice

Premises.Text: Family members such as your parents are experienced in life so they can give you proper and sincere guidance on every aspect of life
And friends, people who are the same generation with you, they are understand your favorite and ability enough to tell you which is suitable for you, which is not
By listening to your family and friends advice, you can definitely avoid many unexpected things
there are so many grate things that you can missed if you don't experience it by yourself
a friend told you not to try skydiving because it was so dangerous
If you did as he told, you could fail to see how wonderful it is to be fall freely
family and friends accidentally harm you by giving you advice all the time
You will grow to be dependent and reliant
free yourself and do what you desire without notice about consequences is the way that success people would like to choose
growth is a long process that experience is indispensable
